about_the_game:
Discover the ultimate tool for creating your own FPV tracks with Track Builder. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, this DLC offers everything you need to design dynamic and exciting tracks in no time.

Ease of Creation

Setting up gates and obstacles has never been easier. With intuitive controls, you can effortlessly place elements and define paths, making track creation simple and fun.

Large and Small Tracks

Design tracks for both regular FPV drones and micro drones. Use predefined obstacles and gates for standard tracks, or create dynamic, small-scale courses with customized gates for micro drones.

Tutorial Mode

New to track building? No problem! We've included a comprehensive tutorial that guides you through the main features of the tool. Learn the basics and master the rules with an interactive experience.

Advanced Features

For more advanced users, we offer extensive options such as lap management, distance measurement, path adjustments, use of imperial units, and the ability to test your track and review flight videos. Unlock the full potential of your FPV track design with these powerful tools.

name: FPV SkyDive - Track Builder
short_description: Track Builder lets you create your own FPV tracks effortlessly. Learn to design tracks and become an FPV expert with the most powerful and user-friendly track creation tools available.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
